y = _{k}_
\(\Rightarrow\) Since X and Y are inversely proportional XY = K
\(\Rightarrow\) Therefore, K =\( (10 \times _{j}_) \times ( 5 \times _{k}_ ) = 50 \times _{j}_ \times _{k}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Hence, when x = \(50 \times _{j}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\) y =\( \frac {50 \times _{j}_ \times _{k}_}{50 \times _{j}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow\) y = _{k}_
